member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.EventLog
member.summary: EventLog writes messages to Debug output, optionally persists them to a database, and optionally sends an email alert via SMTP when configured.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.EventLog.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: EventLog writes messages to Debug output, optionally persists them to a database, and optionally sends an email alert via SMTP when configured.

member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.AuthHelper
member.summary: Simple MSAL-based client credentials helper. Reads configuration keys under `Auth`: - TenantId - ClientId - ClientSecret - Scope (optional, defaults to Business Central scope)

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.AuthHelper.GetAccessTokenAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Acquire an access token. Supports two modes: - service (client credentials) - user (device code flow / delegated) Token is cached until expiry.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.AuthHelper.CreateHttpClientAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Create an HttpClient whose default request headers include a Bearer token. Note: token is fetched once at creation time. For long-running programs consider using a DelegatingHandler that refreshes tokens transparently.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.JsonHelper.ReplacePathValues(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Past de tekstwaarde aan van een parameter in een JSON-string met eenvoudige dot-notatie (geen array indices). Gooit een exception als de target geen string is of niet bestaat (tenzij allowCreate = true).

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.StringHelper.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\D
Explanation:
○ Match any character other than a Unicode digit.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.VatSanitizer.Clean(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verwijdert alles behalve A-Z en 0-9, forceert uppercase country code als aanwezig. Optioneel kan je een defaultCountryCode (bv. "BE") meegeven als er geen code is.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.VatSanitizer.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[^A-Z0-9]
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [^0-9A-Z].

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BeVatValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^BE[0-9]{10}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "BE".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 10 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BeCountryValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^BE[0-9]{10}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "BE".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 10 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.DeCountryValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^DE[0-9]{9}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "DE".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 9 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.FrCountryValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^FR[0-9A-Z]{2}[0-9]{9}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "FR".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Z] exactly 2 times.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 9 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.NlCountryValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^NL[0-9]{9}B[0-9]{2}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "NL".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 9 times.
○ Match 'B'.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 2 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.EuVatValidator.TryValidate(System.String,System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Probeert landcode af te leiden uit string. Als afwezig kun je defaultCountryCode meegeven.

member.summary: Default timeout value set in , or if none was set.

member.summary: Whether is non-infinite.

member.summary: Finds the next index of any character that matches any character other than a Unicode digit.

member.summary: Supports searching for characters in or not in "0123456789".

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_ascii_FF03FEFFFF0700000000
member.summary: Supports searching for characters in or not in "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ".
